name: Goblin Slayer Crimson Tears (Fangame)
description:
This is a free  Fangame RPG based on Goblin Slayer.

The story is a fanfiction and not based on the original story.

I made the game two years ago on my youtube channel for fun and i finally decided to share it here to allow more people to play it.  So if you have some requests  or remarks i can update it.

I hope you enjoy
